title: Electrical Engineer
description: FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC) is an international high school robotics competition. Serve as a member of Team 7047 at Henan Experimental High school, China during 2018-2019. And perform basic programming and design work. Received Industrial Design Award sponsored by General Motors at the 2018 FIRST Power Up's Shanghai competition.
quote: Celebrates the team that demonstrates industrial design principles, striking a balance between form, function, and aesthetics.
